item.title: Notes on Effective Programming Practice
item.description: Slides Example Process of A Project Shell Reference Basics Pipeline TeX Git Reference Basics Escape Vim Late .gitignore Multiple Branches Tagging Collaboration (Ana)Conda Reference Setup for Zsh Create & Delete Environment Kernels Use Sublime with SendCode Python Waf Reference Config Build Miscellaneous Note: I use macOS Catalina with Zsh terminal (Oh-My-Zsh), and Sublime Text 3. Please use Google to tailor your own version.

item.title: Introduction to Python 3
item.description: Notes from DataCamp Slides Basics Functions Methods Packages Package: Numpy Notes from Effective Programming Reference Simple Examples Containers Converting Between Types Alias List & Loop Dictionary Conditionals Function Module Package: Pandas Repl.it - Online Python Editor and IDE Visualize Python, Java, JavaScript, C, C++, Ruby code execution Notes from DataCamp Slides ch1 ch2 ch3 ch4 Basics print("Hello world") 1 + 2 # Out[1]: 3 print( 1 + 2 ) # 3 print( 2 - 1 ) # 1 print( 2 * 3 ) # 6 print( 4 / 2 ) # 2.
